pageContext.claim: “You know, if you look at what's gone on in Portland, those are anarchists and we've taken a very tough stand. If we didn't take a stand in Portland, you know we've arrested many of these leaders.”
pageContext.analysis: Relatively few arrests had been made in Portland by the middle of July, according to data from the U.S. Attorney’s Office in Oregon. The bulk of the less-than 100 federal arrests came after Trump ramped up his rhetoric in the second half of the month.
